Ever left your Garmin running at the end of a ride? All your hard earned averages declined pointelessly?

This simple editor enables you to delete points from the [b end] of a file, and will then recalculate the overall ride data and return a new copy of the file.

To start upload a '.tcx' file. You can convert a .fit file to .tcx using Garmin Connect's export functionality.

Warning: This app has only been tested on an Edge 800 (cycle GPS) with firmware 2.6. YMMV, but a Garmin 610 user reported success.

No copy of the data uploaded or processed is kept.
